title: New: Real Magic – The Trance
body:
Let’s roll out some cliche about the song title fitting the general mood of the track, and just get it over with.

Denver’s **Real Magi**c aka Drew Englander is the latest name to stamp his authority on the blogosphere, and rightly so. _The Trance_ is a vibrantly swirling number, drawing from cheesy 80’s pop and the more modern beat-orientated producers that have dominated the Internet of late.

_strip me of worth, I’ve come back down, forget these words, I’m nothing now_
